create or replace PROCEDURE query_emp_info (eno in number, pename out VARCHAR2, psal out NUMBER, pjob out VARCHAR2 ) as -- 因为这里我们直接使用输出参数作为变量所以不用再定义变量接收

select t.functionsareaid --园区 ,t.functionsareaname,--园区名称 wsdcn,--未属地企业数（户） xzcount,--新增未属地数（本期） ldcount,--本期属地数（本期） qccount,--迁出注销数（本期） nxzcount,--新增未属地数（年） nldcount,--本期属地数（年） nqccount,--迁出注销数（年） kccount, --存量未属地企业数（户） ydns_rmark--备注 from dic_areainfo t left join ( --未属地企业 select t.functionsareaid, count(1) as wsdcn from YDNS_ENTERPRISE t where t.is_emphasis=0 group by t.functionsareaid )wsd on wsd.functionsareaid=t.functionsareaid --本期 left join ( select t.functionsareaid, count(1) as xzcount from YDNS_ENTERPRISE t where t.is_emphasis=0 and t.sc_sign='0' --企业状态 and to_char(t.createtime,'yyyy-mm')='2017-01' group by t.functionsareaid )xz on xz.functionsareaid=t.functionsareaid left join ( select t.functionsareaid, count(1) as ldcount--本期属地 from YDNS_ENTERPRISE t where t.is_emphasis=0 and t.sc_sign='1' and to_char(t.ld_qr_time,'yyyy-mm')='2017-01' group by t.functionsareaid )ld on ld.functionsareaid=t.functionsareaid left join ( select t.functionsareaid, count(1) as qccount--迁出 from YDNS_ENTERPRISE t where t.is_emphasis=0 and t.sc_sign='2' and to_char(t.qc_time,'yyyy-mm')='2017-01' group by t.functionsareaid )qc on qc.functionsareaid=t.functionsareaid --本年 left join ( select t.functionsareaid, count(1) as nxzcount from YDNS_ENTERPRISE t where t.is_emphasis=0 and t.sc_sign='0' and to_char(t.createtime,'yyyy')='2017' group by t.functionsareaid )nxz on nxz.functionsareaid=t.functionsareaid left join ( select t.functionsareaid, count(1) as nldcount from YDNS_ENTERPRISE t where t.is_emphasis=0 and t.sc_sign='1' and to_char(t.ld_qr_time,'yyyy')='2017' group by t.functionsareaid )nld on nld.functionsareaid=t.functionsareaid left join ( select t.functionsareaid, count(1) as nqccount from YDNS_ENTERPRISE t where t.is_emphasis=0 and t.sc_sign='2' and to_char(t.qc_time,'yyyy')='2017' group by t.functionsareaid )nqc on nqc.functionsareaid=t.functionsareaid
--异地户存量 left join ( select t.functionsareaid, sum(decode(t.sc_sign,'0',1,0)) as kccount from YDNS_ENTERPRISE t where t.is_emphasis=0 group by t.functionsareaid ) kc on kc.functionsareaid=t.functionsareaid left join ( select t.functionsareaid, t.remark as ydns_rmark--备注 from YDNS_ENTERPRISE t group by t.functionsareaid , t.remark) ydns_rmark on ydns_rmark.functionsareaid=t.functionsareaid where t.areatype='5' order by to_number(t.remark) <连接>finanic</连接> <时间戳>17-6-23 下午6:13</时间戳> <已执行>4</已执行> <类型>SQL</类型>
